enWisdom: Contentment is a blessing
Magnanimity is contentment and tolerance (or patience)

Wisdom: الْعَبْدُ حُرٌّ مَا قَنِعَ الْحُرُّ عَبْدٌ مَا طَمِعَ
enWisdom: A slave is free as long as he is content and a freeman is a slave as long as he covets
Contentment is the sign of the God-wary
Contentment is the symbol of satisfaction [with Allah’s decree]
Contentment is a sword that does not get blunt
The God-wary person is content, free from sin and chaste
Be content with what you are given and you will be made sufficient

Wisdom: انْتَقِمْ مِنْ حِرْصِكَ بِالْقُنُوعِ كَمَا تَنْتَقِمُ مِنْ عَدُوِّكَ بِالْقِصَاصِ
enWisdom: Take revenge on your greed through contentment, just as you would avenge your enemy by retaliation
The most pleasant life is [a life of] contentment
The most pleasant share is contentment and good health

Wisdom: أَعْوَنُ شَيْ‏ءٍ عَلَى صَلَاحِ النَّفْسِ الْقَنَاعَةُ
enWisdom: The most helpful thing in reforming the self is contentment

Wisdom: إِنَّكُمْ إِلَى الْقَنَاعَةِ بِيَسِيرِ الرِّزْقِ أَحْوَجُ مِنْكُمْ إِلَى اكْتِسَابِ الْحِرْصِ فِي الطَّلَبِ
enWisdom: Verily you are in greater need of being content with a little sustenance than being greedy of acquiring more
When you are deprived, then be content [with what you have]

Wisdom: إِذَا أَرَادَ اللَّهُ بِعَبْدٍ خَيْراً أَلْهَمَهُ الْقَنَاعَةَ وَأَصْلَحَ لَهُ زَوْجَهُ
enWisdom: When Allah wishes good for a servant, He inspires him with contentment and sets his wife right for him

Wisdom: إِذَا أَرَادَ اللَّهُ بِعَبْدٍ خَيْراً أَلْهَمَهُ الْقَنَاعَةَ [أَلْهَمَهُ الطَّاعَةَ وَحَبَّبَ إِلَيْهِ الْقَنَاعَةَ] فَاكْتَفَى بِالْكَفَافِ وَاكْتَسَى بِالْعَفَافِ
enWisdom: When Allah wishes good for a servant, He inspires him with contentment, so he becomes satisfied with the minimum and covers himself with chastity [and abstinence from the unlawful]
Complement your food with hunger and discipline yourself with contentment
The beauty of life is [in] contentment

Wisdom: حِفْظُ مَا فِي يَدِكَ خَيْرٌ لَكَ مِنْ طَلَبِ مَا فِي يَدِ غَيْرِكَ
enWisdom: Preserving that which is in your possession is better for you than seeking that which is in someone else’s possession
The felicity of a person is [in] contentment and satisfaction

Wisdom: طُوبَى لِمَنْ تَجَلْبَبَ بِالْقُنُوعِ وَتَجَنَّبَ الْإِسْرَافَ
enWisdom: Blessed is the one who covers himself with contentment and keeps away from extravagance
The height of moderation is contentment
Be a pious, contented and modest believer

Wisdom: لَمْ يَتَحَلَّ بِالْقَنَاعَةِ مَنْ لَمْ يَكْتَفِ بِيَسِيرِ مَا وَجَدَ
enWisdom: One who is not satisfied with the little that he gets has not adorned himself with contentment
One who has intelligence is content
One of the most honourable morals is adorning oneself with contentment
Remaining contented is from the noble endeavours

Wisdom: مَا اسْتَغْنَيْتَ عَنْهُ خَيْرٌ مِمَّا اسْتَغْنَيْتَ بِهِ
enWisdom: That which you have no need for is better than that through which you gain independence

Wisdom: مَا أَحْسَنَ بِالْإِنْسَانِ أَنْ يَقْنَعَ بِالْقَلِيلِ وَيَجُودَ بِالْجَزِيلِ
enWisdom: How good it is for a person to be contented with little and generous with much!
The best fortune is contentment
The best attribute is contentment
How good an assistant of piety hunger is!
There is no treasure like contentment

Wisdom: يَنْبَغِي لِمَنْ عَرَفَ نَفْسَهُ أَنْ يَلْزَمَ الْقَنَاعَةَ وَالْعِفَّةَ
enWisdom: It behoves the one who knows himself to espouse contentment and chastity

Wisdom: إِذَا لَمْ يَكُنْ مَا تُرِيدُ فَأَرِدْ مَا يَكُونُ
enWisdom: When what you want does not happen, then want what happens [and be satisfied with it]
